home.title: Welcome to Valknut
home.subtitle: A powerful Discord bot for your server
home.moderationDesc: Powerful moderation tools for your server
home.loggingDesc: Keep track of all important events
home.backupDesc: Secure backups of your server data
home.customizableDesc: Customize the bot to your needs
home.getStartedDesc: Start setting up Valknut for your Discord server
home.step3Desc: Set up the bot via the dashboard
home.cookieConsentRequiredDesc: You must accept cookies to log in.
home.consentRevokedDesc: Your cookie consent has expired or been revoked.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noServersFoundDesc: The bot is not in any of your servers yet, or you don't have admin rights.

guild.title: Server Management
guild.logChannelDesc: Channel where bot logs are sent
guild.moderatorRoleDesc: Role that can use moderator commands

onboarding.title: Onboarding Settings
onboarding.description: Configure the onboarding process for new members
onboarding.autoRoleDesc: Role automatically assigned to new members

backups.title: Server Backups
backups.noBackupsDesc: No backups have been created for this server yet.
backups.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this backup?
backups.confirmRestore: Are you sure you want to restore this backup? This may overwrite existing data.

admin.title: User Management
admin.addUserDesc: Enter a Discord user ID to grant access
admin.noUsersDesc: No users have been added yet.
admin.confirmRevoke: Are you sure you want to revoke access for this user?

twofa.title: Two-factor authentication
twofa.setupDesc: Protect your account with two-factor authentication
twofa.scanQR: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
twofa.enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your app to verify
twofa.disableWarning: Disabling 2FA makes your account less secure.
twofa.confirmDisable: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA?
twofa.backupCodesDesc: Save these codes in a secure place. You can use them to log in if you don't have access to your authenticator app.

errors.404Desc: The page you are looking for does not exist.
errors.errorDesc: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errors.unauthorizedDesc: You do not have access to this page.
errors.serverErrorDesc: There is a problem with the server. Please try again later.
